tweet.text: On March 8, 1985, Pres. Ronald Reagan sent off the delegation to the Nuclear and Space Talks in Geneva, led by Max Kampelman. “The President has given high priority to seeking equitable and verifiable arms control agreements.” https://t.co/RB3qzGKk2L 📷 @Reagan_Library https://t.co/db7xs3Hty1
